newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed call to character factional warfare endpoint determining if a character is enlisted, so it doesn't produce API errors any more. * Fixed a crash bug when shift selecting in Items browser without first selecting a node.
== Enhancements ==
* Switched to usage of API endpoint sender name element for EVE mail messages instead of internal discovery algorithm via CharacterID call. * Switched to usage of API endpoint sender name element for EVE notifications instead of internal discovery algorithm via CharacterID call. * Updated the notifications ref type list.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better application.
